name: MutterSlagge
description:
In MutterSlagge two gentleman robots (gentlebots?) face off against each other: you move upwards on your nut and let gravity move you down, while trying to collect energy crystals in order to shoot your opponent with your deadly tesla canon. Keep an eye on your generator to check how much energy you have.

PC CONTROLS:
Jump: X or Numpad 2
Shoot: Z or Numpad 1
Start the game with Spacebar.

XBOX CONTROLS:
Jump: A
Shoot: X

MutterSlagge is swedish and is loosely translated to NutWars. It was made during a weekend-long game jam by Jonas Svensson and Alexander Strandberg. The theme for the game jam was "Teleporting Steampunk".
